text:
I was wondering when you'd have this song up. :P

I was completely blown away when I found out this song was from a Genesis game. Tim Follin definitely didn't believe in limitations, and it shows here!

author: IAmLuisRomero

text: The Genesis version of this game was never released and it was the only one that featured music made by Tim Follin. He quit making videogame music about 5 years ago because the irregular work didn't provide a substantial income. Which is really too bad, because a legend like him shouldn't have those problems. He inspired a lot of other music composers like David Wise, Richard Jacques, Jesper Kyd, etc.
author: SupraDarky
